title: 705 Piedmont Avenue
description: 705 Piedmont Avenue is a luxury apartment located in Atlanta, GA. It offers a prime location with waterfront views and easy access to amenities such as barbecue areas. The apartment features 1 bedroom and 1 bathroom, with a size of 700 sqft. It is pet-friendly and does not include utilities. Viewings for this property can be scheduled through the provided link.

importantInformation.viewings: Viewings for this property can be scheduled through the provided link.
